00009 void IplTexture::genTexture()
00010 {
00011 #ifdef HAVE_GL
00012         if (im==0) return;
00013 
00014         if (!textureGenerated) {
00015                 glGenTextures(1,(GLuint*) &texture);
00016                 textureGenerated = true;
00017         }
00018         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture);
00019 
00020         for (texWidth=1; texWidth < im->width; texWidth <<=1);
00021         for (texHeight=1; texHeight < im->height; texHeight <<=1);
00022 
00023         if (texWidth > 1024) texWidth = 1024;
00024         if (texHeight > 1024) texHeight = 1024;
00025         //std::cout << "IplTexture *: "<< this << ": generating a " << texWidth << "x" << texHeight << " texture for a "
00026         //      << im->width << "x" << im->height << " image.\n";
00027 
00028         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_S, GL_REPEAT);
00029         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_WRAP_T, GL_REPEAT);
00030         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, (smooth ? GL_LINEAR : GL_NEAREST));
00031         glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, (smooth ? GL_LINEAR : GL_NEAREST));
00032 
00033         int sz = texWidth*texHeight*4;
00034         char *buffer = (char *) malloc(sz);
00035         memset(buffer, 0, sz);
00036 
00037         glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGBA, texWidth,texHeight, 0, GL_RGBA,
00038                         GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, buffer);
00039         free(buffer);
00040 #endif
00041 }
00042 
00043 void IplTexture::loadTexture()
00044 {
00045 #ifdef HAVE_GL
00046         if (im==0) return;
00047         if (!textureGenerated) genTexture();
00048 
00049         IplImage *im = (downsampled ? downsampled : this->im);
00050 
00051         if ((im->width > texWidth) || (im->height > texHeight)) {
00052                 if (downsampled) cvReleaseImage(&downsampled);
00053                 downsampled = cvCreateImage(cvSize(texWidth, texHeight), this->im->depth, this->im->nChannels);
00054                 im = downsampled;
00055         }
00056 
00057         glEnable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00058         glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, texture);
00059 
00060         if (allowCache && !reload) return;
00061         reload = false;
00062 
00063         if (downsampled)
00064                 cvResize(this->im, downsampled, CV_INTER_AREA);
00065 
00066         GLenum format;
00067         GLenum type;
00068         switch (im->depth) {
00069                 case IPL_DEPTH_8U: type = GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE; break;
00070                 case IPL_DEPTH_8S: type = GL_BYTE; break;
00071                 case IPL_DEPTH_16S: type = GL_SHORT; break;
00072                 case IPL_DEPTH_32F: type = GL_FLOAT; break;
00073                 default:
00074                                     std::cerr << "IplTexture::loadTexture(): unsupported pixel type.\n";
00075                                     return;
00076         }
00077         switch (im->nChannels) {
00078                 case 1: format = GL_LUMINANCE; break;
00079                 case 3: format = (im->channelSeq[0] == 'B') ? GL_BGR_EXT : GL_RGB; break;
00080                 case 4: format = GL_RGBA; break;
00081                 default:
00082                         std::cerr << "IplTexture::loadTexture(): unsupported number of channels.\n";
00083                         return;
00084         }
00085 
00086         // pixel storage mode
00087         glPixelStorei(GL_UNPACK_ALIGNMENT, im->align);
00088 
00089         glTexSubImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, 0, 0, im->width, im->height,
00090                         format, type, im->imageData);
00091 
00092         uScale = (double(im->width)/double(this->im->width))/double(texWidth);
00093         vScale = (double(im->height)/double(this->im->height))/double(texHeight);
00094         vOrigin = 0;
00095 
00096         if (im->origin) {
00097                 vScale = -vScale;
00098                 vOrigin = double(im->height)/double(texHeight);
00099         }
00100 #endif
00101 }

00103 void IplTexture::disableTexture()
00104 {
00105 #ifdef HAVE_GL
00106         glDisable(GL_TEXTURE_2D);
00107 #endif
00108 }

00110 void IplTexture::unref()
00111 {
00112         refcnt--;
00113         if (refcnt <= 0)
00114                 delete this;
00115 }

00117 void IplTexture::setImage(IplImage *image)
00118 {
00119         im = image;
00120         update();
00121 }

00123 void IplTexture::regen()
00124 {
00125         update(); 
00126         textureGenerated = false;
